text: Need Blake Cox for Witchery campaign. Budget around $10,861, looking for 3 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Instagram post, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Facebook post, 2 x Instagram post. 12 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
